trans-unit.source: Provides static methods used to draw user interface elements on activity designer surfaces.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce metodi statici che consentono di disegnare elementi di interfaccia utente sull'area degli ActivityDesigner.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a way to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class to draw a custom activity on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato un modo per utilizzare la classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> per creare un'attività personalizzata nell'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: A rounded rectangle is first drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per prima cosa viene tracciato un rettangolo arrotondato utilizzando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Text is then drawn using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> and is placed at the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Il testo viene quindi tracciato mediante <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> e posizionato nel percorso dell'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associata all'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> viene tracciata utilizzando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, an expand button used by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Infine, tramite il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, viene disegnato un pulsante Espandi utilizzato da un oggetto della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the 3-dimensional button.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> su cui disegnare il pulsante tridimensionale.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw on the button.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> da disegnare sul pulsante.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds of the button.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> che definisce i limiti del pulsante.

trans-unit.source: The single-precision floating-point number to specify the transparency level of the button.
trans-unit.target: Numero a virgola mobile e a precisione singola che consente di specificare il livello di trasparenza del pulsante.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState" /> enumeration value to specify the appearance of the button.
trans-unit.target: Valore dell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState" /> che consente di specificare l'aspetto del pulsante.

trans-unit.source: Draws a 3-dimensional button on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un pulsante tridimensionale nell'area dell'ActivityDesigner.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" /> contiene un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the button.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> su cui disegnare il pulsante.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds of the button.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> che definisce i limiti del pulsante.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw an expanded button; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per disegnare un pulsante espanso; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> associated with the activity designer used to render the button.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> associata all'ActivityDesigner utilizzata per eseguire il rendering del pulsante.

trans-unit.source: Draws a button that is used to expand and collapse composite designers on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un pulsante che viene utilizzato per espandere e comprimere finestre di progettazione composite nell'area dell'ActivityDesigner.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a way to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class to draw a custom activity on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato un modo per utilizzare la classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> per creare un'attività personalizzata nell'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: A rounded rectangle is first drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per prima cosa viene tracciato un rettangolo arrotondato utilizzando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Text is then drawn using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> and is placed at the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Il testo viene quindi tracciato mediante <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> e posizionato nel percorso dell'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associata all'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> viene tracciata utilizzando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, an expand button used by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Infine, tramite il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, viene disegnato un pulsante Espandi utilizzato da un oggetto della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" /> or <paramref name="compositeDesignerTheme" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" /> o <paramref name="compositeDesignerTheme" /> contiene un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Draws an image on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un'immagine nell'area dell'ActivityDesigner.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> su cui disegnare l'immagine.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds of the image to draw.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> che definisce i limiti dell'immagine da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" /> that specifies how the image is aligned in the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" /> che specifica la modalità di allineamento dell'immagine nel rettangolo di delimitazione.

trans-unit.source: Draws an image on the activity designer surface by using a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />, a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, and a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" />.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un'immagine nell'area dell'ActivityDesigner utilizzando una classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, una classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />, una struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> e un'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" />.

trans-unit.source: When you use this version of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A>, the source rectangle is set to the size, in pixels, of the image, the transparency setting is set to 1.0f, and drawing grayscales is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza questa versione di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A>, il rettangolo di origine viene impostato sulla dimensione, in pixel, dell'immagine, la trasparenza viene impostata su 1.0f e non viene consentita la visualizzazione di scale di grigi.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a way to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class to draw a custom activity on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato un modo per utilizzare la classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> per creare un'attività personalizzata nell'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: A rounded rectangle is first drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per prima cosa viene tracciato un rettangolo arrotondato utilizzando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Text is then drawn using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> and is placed at the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Il testo viene quindi tracciato mediante <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> e posizionato nel percorso dell'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associata all'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> viene tracciata utilizzando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, an expand button used by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Infine, tramite il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, viene disegnato un pulsante Espandi utilizzato da un oggetto della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" />, <paramref name="image" />, or <paramref name="destination" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" />, <paramref name="image" /> o <paramref name="destination" /> contiene un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> su cui disegnare l'immagine.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds of the image.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> che definisce i limiti dell'immagine.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the source of the image.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> che definisce l'origine dell'immagine.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" /> that specifies how the image is aligned in the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" /> che specifica la modalità di allineamento dell'immagine nel rettangolo di delimitazione.

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point number that defines the transparency settings for the image.
trans-unit.target: Numero a virgola mobile e a precisione singola che definisce le impostazioni di trasparenza relative all'immagine.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw the image in grayscales; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per disegnare l'immagine in scale di grigi; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Draws an image on the activity designer surface by using a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />, a source and destination <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" />, a single-precision floating-point number, and a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un'immagine nell'area dell'ActivityDesigner utilizzando una classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, una classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />, una struttura di origine e di destinazione <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, un'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" />, un numero a virgola mobile e a precisione singola e un valore booleano.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" />, <paramref name="image" />, <paramref name="destination" />, or <paramref name="source" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" />, <paramref name="image" />, <paramref name="destination" /> o <paramref name="source" /> contiene un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="transparency" /> is less than 0, or greater than 1.0f.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transparency" /> è minore di 0 o maggiore di 1.0f.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> su cui disegnare il rettangolo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> to draw the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> che consente di disegnare sul pulsante.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds of the rounded rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> che definisce i limiti del rettangolo arrotondato.

trans-unit.source: The integer value of the radius to use for the rounded edges.
trans-unit.target: Valore integer del raggio da utilizzare per i bordi arrotondati.

trans-unit.source: Draws a rounded rectangle on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un rettangolo arrotondato nell'area dell'ActivityDesigner.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> uses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.GetRoundedRectanglePath%2A> method to obtain the path to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> utilizza il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.GetRoundedRectanglePath%2A> per ottenere il percorso da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a way to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class to draw a custom activity on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato un modo per utilizzare la classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> per creare un'attività personalizzata nell'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: A rounded rectangle is first drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per prima cosa viene tracciato un rettangolo arrotondato utilizzando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Text is then drawn using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> and is placed at the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Il testo viene quindi tracciato mediante <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> e posizionato nel percorso dell'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associata all'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> viene tracciata utilizzando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, an expand button used by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Infine, tramite il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, viene disegnato un pulsante Espandi utilizzato da un oggetto della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" /> or <paramref name="drawingPen" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" /> o <paramref name="drawingPen" /> contiene un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> sulla quale disegnare il testo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> used to draw the text
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> utilizzata per disegnare il testo.

trans-unit.source: The text to draw.
trans-unit.target: Testo da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which the text must be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> di delimitazione in cui disegnare il testo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringAlignment" /> that specifies where the text is aligned in the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringAlignment" /> che specifica la posizione di allineamento del testo nel rettangolo di delimitazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality" /> that specifies the quality setting to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality" /> che specifica il livello di qualità con cui disegnare il testo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> utilizzata per disegnare il testo.

trans-unit.source: Draws text on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un testo nell'area dell'ActivityDesigner.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a way to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class to draw a custom activity on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato un modo per utilizzare la classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> per creare un'attività personalizzata nell'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: A rounded rectangle is first drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per prima cosa viene tracciato un rettangolo arrotondato utilizzando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Text is then drawn using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> and is placed at the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Il testo viene quindi tracciato mediante <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> e posizionato nel percorso dell'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associata all'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> viene tracciata utilizzando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, an expand button used by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Infine, tramite il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, viene disegnato un pulsante Espandi utilizzato da un oggetto della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" />, <paramref name="font" />, <paramref name="text" />, or <paramref name="textBrush" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" />, <paramref name="font" />, <paramref name="text" /> o <paramref name="textBrush" /> contiene un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> for which to obtain the graphics path.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> per cui ottenere il percorso grafico.

trans-unit.source: An integer that defines the radius to use to draw the rounded corners.
trans-unit.target: Numero intero che definisce il raggio da utilizzare per disegnare gli angoli arrotondati.

trans-unit.source: Returns the graphics path used to draw the specified rounded rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il percorso grafico usato per disegnare il rettangolo arrotondato specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> that draws the rounded path of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> che disegna il percorso arrotondato del rettangolo specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method uses <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.GetRoundedRectanglePath%2A> to obtain the path to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> utilizza <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.GetRoundedRectanglePath%2A> per ottenere il percorso da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rectangle" /> is set to <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rectangle" /> è impostato su <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty" />.
--oppure--

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="radius" /> is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="radius" /> è minore o uguale a 0.
